## runLocalServices() function

Spawn bootstrap and signalling server to enable peer discovery and connections between peers.

**Signature:**

```typescript
runLocalServices: () => Promise<{
    servicesProcess: ChildProcessWithoutNullStreams;
    bootstrapServerUrl: URL;
    signalingServerUrl: URL;
}>
```
**Returns:**

Promise&lt;{ servicesProcess: ChildProcessWithoutNullStreams; bootstrapServerUrl: URL; signalingServerUrl: URL; }&gt;
